Lyric:
[by:Sherry_Esther]
[00:03.30]5, 6, 7
[00:04.74]
[00:19.74]Just stop your crying, it's a sign of the times
[00:25.94]Welcome to the final show
[00:29.58]Hope you're wearing your best clothes
[00:34.92]You can't bribe the door on your way to the sky
[00:41.04]You look pretty good down here
[00:45.08]But you ain't really good
[00:50.09]We never learn, we been here before
[00:53.78]Why are we always stuck and running from
[00:56.94]The bullets? The bullets?
[01:05.17]We never learn, we been here before
[01:08.86]Why are we always stuck and running from
[01:12.08]The bullets? The bullets?
[01:20.24]Just stop your crying, it's a sign of the times
[01:26.09]We gotta get away from here
[01:29.97]We gotta get away from here
[01:35.03]Just stop your crying, it'll be alright
[01:41.02]They told me that the end is near
[01:45.07]We gotta get away from here
[01:50.28]Just stop your crying, have the time of your life
[01:56.02]Breaking through the atmosphere
[01:59.72]Things are pretty good from here
[02:04.71]Remember everything will be alright
[02:10.44]And we can meet again somewhere
[02:14.11]Somewhere far away from here
[02:19.20]Just stop your crying, it's a sign of the times
[02:25.01]We gotta get away from here
[02:28.79]We gotta get away from here
[02:33.97]Stop your crying, baby, it'll be alright
[02:39.68]They told me that the end is near
[02:43.41]We gotta get away from here
[02:48.47]We don't talk enough, we should open up
[02:55.44]Before it's all too much
[03:02.29]Will we ever learn? We've been here before
[03:09.71]It's just what we know
[03:16.64]Stop your crying, baby, it's a sign of the times
[03:22.20]We gotta get away, we got to get away
[03:25.86]We got to get away
[03:29.48]We got to get away
[03:32.71]We got to, we got to, get away
[03:35.62]We got to, we got to, get away
[03:39.08]We got to, we got to, get away
[03:40.43]Baby,oh, baby,oh
[03:41.67]You got to, you got to, you got to get away
[03:45.88]You got to, you got to get away
[03:49.57]Baby,oh, baby,oh
[03:51.54]You got to, you got to, you got to get away
[04:02.63]
